title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. A, pt. 1000 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. A, pt. 1000 - Definitions

State Regulations
§ 1000.1 - Authorities covered under this Subchapter
§ 1000.2 - Chairman of the authorities
§ 1000.3 - Secretaries of the authorities
§ 1000.4 to 1000.6 - Renumbered
§ 1000.7 - Renumbered

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXI, subch. A, pt. 1000

Statutory authority: Public Authorities Law, §§553, 1203-a, 1204, 1266

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
